de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag

Class TagFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.TagFactory

  • public class TagFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class implements the transparent creation of tag objects.

    • Method Detail

      • createTag

        public static <T extends BaseTag> T createTag(java.lang.Class<T> tagClass,
                                              de.feig.FedmIscReader reader,
                                              de.feig.FedmTableItem item)
                                       throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException,
                                              TagException
        Creates a tag from the specified tag class. The Method calls the constructor of the specified tag class with the reader and item parameter.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the tag type to instantiate a new tag object from
        Parameters:
        tagClass - the tag class to instantiate a new tag object from
        reader - the reader object will be passed to the constructor of the tag class
        item - the item object will be passed to the constructor of the tag class
        Returns:
        a newly created tag object
        Throws:
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException - if the supplied tag class doesn't implement the required constructor to initiate the tag object
        TagException - if the constructor of the tag class throws an exception
